00039 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00040 
00041 #include "CmdCopy.h"
00042 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00043 #include "SceneModel.h"
00044 
00050 CmdCopy::CmdCopy( const QModelIndex& index, SoNode*& clipboard, SceneModel* model, QUndoCommand* parent)
00051 : QUndoCommand("Copy", parent), m_pClipboard ( clipboard ), m_pNode( 0 ),m_previousNode ( 0 ), m_pModel( model )
00052 {
00053         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( index );
00054         m_pNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
00055 
00056         m_previousNode = clipboard ;
00057 }
00058 
00062 CmdCopy::~CmdCopy()
00063 {
00064 }
00065 
00070 void CmdCopy::undo()
00071 {
00072         m_pClipboard = m_previousNode;
00073 }
00074 
00079 void CmdCopy::redo( )
00080 {
00081         m_pClipboard  = m_pNode;
00082 }
